hero.title: Divorcy will help you plan and estimate the costs of your divorce
hero.subtitle: Having a divorce sucks! Divorcy helps you make smart and swift decisions. So you can start focusing on your future - not your past!

subscribe.description: It'll help you to understand whole process as well as save time & cost

getStarted.header:: Hello, I'm here for helping you get overview further process!

forecast.subtitle: Here's expected cost & recommendations of next steps.
